summary: Businessman Manav falls for aspiring singer Mansi, but their romance faces an uphill climb when Manav must depart and Mansi's suave manager moves in.
cast: Akshaye Khanna|Anil Kapoor|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Alok Nath|Amrish Puri|Sushma Seth|Mita Vasisht|Saurabh Shukla|Jividha Sharma|Tanya Mukherjee|Supriya Karnik|Prithvi Zutshi|Manoj Pahwa|Rajesh Khera|Mithilesh Chaturvedi|Puneet Vashisht|Akash Karnataki|Vinod Raut|Usha Bachani|Bhairavi|Alka|Mukund Bhatt|Aliraza Namdar|Kamal Adib|Shreechand Makhija|Jash Trivedi|Trilok Kapoor|Sunil Nagar|Shanu Dev|Mahesh Mehboobani|Prakash Bharadwaj|Ekta Jain|Anita Hassanandani Reddy|Jaideep Sood|Sooch Bhatti|Shawn Byfield|Bobby Darling|Subhash Ghai|Nafisa Joseph|Shahid Kapoor|Kashif Khan|Isha Sharvani
keywords: motorcycle|father son relationship|reference to saraswati the hindu deity|singer|rain
title: Taal
